column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " Where is he ?
#Text=You 're hurting my feelings .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Stop wasting our time and give us the information .
#Text=You 're powerless right now , so you 're in no position to refuse .
#Text=" Toph says : " And stick to the truth .
#Text=I 'll be able to tell if you 're lying .
#Text=" Azula says : " Are you sure ?
#Text=I 'm a pretty good liar .
#Text=I am a four - hundred foot tall purple platypus bear with pink horns and silver wings .
#Text=" Toph says : " Okay , you 're good , I admit it .
#Text=But you ought to consider telling the truth anyway !
#Text=" Azula says : " When I left Ba Sing Se I brought home some souvenirs : Dai Li agents !
#Text=" Bato says : " Surround the periphery !
#Text=We have to secure the palace by the time the eclipse is over !
#Text=Otherwise , we 'll be in for the fight of our lives .
#Text=" Tyro says : " Stop !
#Text=Surrender peacefully and we wo n't harm you .
#Text=" Fire Nation soldier says : " We 'll never surrender !
#Text=Okay , we surrender .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " There it is : the Fire Nation Royal Palace .
#Text=We 've come so far .
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's not over yet .
#Text="
